mapper.sql: select id, refund_no, user_id, order_no, outer_trade_no, amount, description, status, code, message, del_flag, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from refund_order
mapper.select:
select r.id, r.refund_no, r.order_no, r.outer_trade_no, r.amount, r.description, r.status, r.code, r.message, r.del_flag, r.remark, r.create_by, r.create_time, r.update_by, r.update_time, u.nick_name, u.phonenumber from refund_order r left join sys_user u on u.user_id = r.user_id
and u.phonenumber = #{phonenumber} and r.refund_no = #{refundNo} and r.order_no = #{orderNo} and r.status = #{status} and r.create_time >= #{beginCreateTime} and r.create_time <= #{endCreateTime} and r.del_flag = 0
order by r.id desc
mapper.update: update refund_order set status = 2, update_time = now(), code = #{code}, message = #{msg} where refund_no = #{refundNo} and status = 0
update refund_order set outer_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}, update_time = now() where refund_no = #{refundNo}
